sentences.en: A tabloid lonely hearts columnist who answers questions from readers.
sentences.cn: 小报上往往有求友、求婚的专栏,主持这个专栏并负责回答读者来信的人.

sentences.en: Clarence Page is a columnist for the Chicago Tribune.
sentences.cn: 克拉伦斯·佩奇是《芝加哥论坛报》的专栏作家。

sentences.en: Did you notice that the aforementioned community columnist did not play by these rules?
sentences.cn: 你注意上述的社区专栏作家不遵守这些规则 吗 ?

sentences.en: Guess which two - bit gossip columnist is talking out of his ass?
sentences.cn: 你猜哪个微不足道的专栏作家最会胡说八道?

sentences.en: I think you'd agree he's a very respected columnist.
sentences.cn: 我想你得承认他是个备受尊敬的专栏作家。

sentences.en: If I a columnist , one thing matters above all.
sentences.cn: 如果我是个专栏作家, 首先至关重要的只有一件事.

sentences.en: Political - columnist Nuray Mert says that ruling strengthen the hands of the prosecutor.
sentences.cn: 政治专栏作家默尔特说,那项判决加强了检察官的力量.

sentences.en: That newspaper columnist derides the mayor whenever he can.
sentences.cn: 那位报纸专栏作家从不放过取笑市长的机会.

sentences.en: The columnist holds the colorful column of the colonial newspaper.
sentences.cn: 那位专栏作家主持殖民地报纸的多彩专栏.

sentences.en: The columnist insinuated — but never actually asserted — that the candidate had underworld ties.
sentences.cn: 这家报纸有一位深受欢迎的专栏作家评论时事.

sentences.en: The gossip columnist got his information by visiting nightclubs every night.
sentences.cn: 那位漫谈专栏作家通过每晚去夜总会获取写作素材.

sentences.en: The host was interviewing a local columnist.
sentences.cn: 节目主持人正在同一位当地的专栏作家交谈.

sentences.en: The newspaper columnist is a big name - dropper.
sentences.cn: 这位报纸专栏作家动不动就提几个名人,以提高自己.

sentences.en: The political columnist in me wanted to know why: the power of Senator Robert Byrd?
sentences.cn: 作为政治专栏的撰稿人,我骨子里要求自己找出其中的原因: 是参议员罗伯特·伯德的力量?

sentences.en: When a political columnist describes a cabinet minister in slavishly adoring terms, shouldn't we be told whether the two are pals?
sentences.cn: 当一名政治专栏作家用大肆吹捧的语言描写某位内阁部长时，难道不该让我们知道这两个人是不是老相识吗？

words.tran_cn: 纵队，列；专栏；圆柱，柱形物

trans.tran_en: someone who writes articles, especially about a particular subject, that appear regularly in a newspaper or magazine
